mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_input_list( option_fk, pil_qty, pil_admin, pil_admin_pk, pil_perm_flag, pil_req_date, pil_exp_date, pil_perm_admin, pil_perm_admin_pk, pil_res_date, pil_file_path, pil_file_name, pil_file_exe, pil_file_ori_name ) VALUES( #{optionFk}, #{pilQty}, #{pilAdmin}, #{pilAdminPk}, #{pilPermFlag}, #{pilReqDate}, #{pilExpDate}, #{pilPermAdmin}, #{pilPermAdminPk}, #{pilResDate}, #{pilFilePath}, #{pilFileName}, #{pilFileExe}, #{pilFileOriName} )
mapper.select:
SELECT outter.* FROM ( SELECT pil.pil_pk, pil.pil_qty, pil.pil_admin, pil.pil_admin_pk, pil.pil_perm_flag, DATE_FORMAT(pil.pil_req_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS pil_req_date, DATE_FORMAT(pil.pil_exp_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS pil_exp_date, pil.pil_perm_admin, pil.pil_perm_admin_pk, DATE_FORMAT(pil.pil_res_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS pil_res_date, pil.pil_regdate, pil.pil_file_path, pil.pil_file_name, pil.pil_file_ori_name, pil.pil_file_exe, op.option_pk, op.option_name, op.option_stock, op.option_stock_max_alarm, pro.product_name FROM product_input_list pil INNER JOIN options op ON pil.option_fk = op.option_pk INNER JOIN products pro ON op.product_fk = pro.product_pk
AND (CONCAT(pro.product_name,' ',op.option_name) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchOne},'%') OR op.option_barcode_number1 = #{searchOne} )
AND pil_perm_flag = 0
AND pil_perm_flag = 1
AND pil_regdate >= #{searchMinDate} AND pil_regdate < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{searchMaxDate}, INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND ${dateType} >= #{searchMinDate} AND ${dateType} < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{searchMaxDate}, INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
) outter ORDER BY outter.pil_regdate DESC LIMIT #{firstRecordIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(pil.pil_pk) FROM product_input_list pil INNER JOIN options op ON pil.option_fk = op.option_pk INNER JOIN products pro ON op.product_fk = pro.product_pk
AND (CONCAT(pro.product_name,' ',op.option_name) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchOne},'%') OR op.option_barcode_number1 = #{searchOne} )
AND pil_perm_flag = 0
AND pil_perm_flag = 1
AND pil_regdate >= #{searchMinDate} AND pil_regdate < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{searchMaxDate}, INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND ${dateType} >= #{searchMinDate} AND ${dateType} < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{searchMaxDate}, INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT pil_perm_flag FROM product_input_list WHERE pil_pk = #{pilPk}
mapper.update: UPDATE product_input_list SET pil_perm_flag = #{pilPermFlag}, pil_perm_admin = #{pilPermAdmin}, pil_perm_admin_pk = #{pilPermAdminPk}, pil_res_date = #{pilResDate} WHERE pil_pk = #{pilPk}
